text: The new AI model is revolutionary
I'm scared of what this AI model means for artists and creatives.
This new AI is just a tool
column3: like a paintbrush. Artists will learn to use it.

text: I don't trust the corporations behind this AI. They only care about profit.
The new model is just so creative! I generated a poem and it was beautiful.
This technology is a Pandora's Box. We can't go back.
I'm worried about my job. This AI can do what I do

column3: this thing is a toy. It makes a lot of mistakes.

text: The profit motive will always corrupt pure creation.
I'm just excited to see what beautiful art people make with this.
I'm scared of the bias in these models. It's a real danger.
This AI is a tool for progress
column3: and progress is always scary at first.

text: What about the environmental cost? These models use so much energy.
The environmental cost is a small price to pay for this leap in progress.
